id.description: The unique identifier of the time entry.

date.description: The date of the time entry.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the time entry was created.

user.description: The user associated with the time entry.

time.description: The time spent on the task entry.

task.description: Represents a task with associated time data

id.description: The unique identifier of the task.

url.description: The URL related to the task.

projects.description: Specifies the projects the task is associated with.

items.description: Projects the task is associated with.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the task was created.

labels.description: Provides labels associated with the task.

time.description: Contains information about the time tracked for the task

total.description: The total time spent on the task.

users.description: Contains users and their time entries for the task.

timerTime.description: The time spent on the task with a timer.

completed.description: Indicates if the task is completed.

assignees.description: Lists the users assigned to the task.

history.description: Represents the time entry history related to the task.

items.description: History items related to the time entry.

lockReasons.description: Contains reasons for locking the time entry.

items.description: Reasons for locking the time entry.

isLocked.description: Indicates if the time entry is locked.

cost.description: The cost associated with the time entry.

costRate.description: The cost rate for the time entry.
